sourcesContent:
// Libraries import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router' import classNames from 'classnames' // Components import { money } from 'utils' import IconButton from 'shared/iconButton' // Keys const INVOICE_INNER_KEY = 'invoice_mg' const INVOICE_FOLIO_KEY = 'folio' const INVOICE_TOTAL_KEY = 'total_cents' const INVOICE_INVALID_KEY = 'invalid' const INVOICE_ERROR_KEY = 'errors' const INVOICE_ERROR_BASE_KEY = 'base' const CONCEPT_KEY = 'line_item_mgs' const CONCEPT_DESCRIPTION_KEY = 'description' const CONCEPT_PRODUCT_CODE_KEY = 'product_service_code' const CONCEPT_UNITY_CODE_KEY = 'unity_code' const CONCEPT_QUANTITY_KEY = 'quantity' const CONCEPT_UNIT_PRICE_KEY = 'unit_price_cents' const RFC_KEY = 'rfc' // Render single invoice const renderInvoice = (invoice, i) => { const concept = invoice[INVOICE_INNER_KEY][CONCEPT_KEY][0] const validIcon = typeof invoice[INVOICE_INVALID_KEY] !== 'undefined' && invoice[INVOICE_INVALID_KEY] ? 'close' : 'check' const invoiceId = typeof invoice.id !== 'undefined' ? invoice.id : null const errorMessage = typeof invoice[INVOICE_ERROR_KEY] !== 'undefined' && typeof invoice[INVOICE_ERROR_KEY][INVOICE_ERROR_BASE_KEY] !== 'undefined' ? invoice[INVOICE_ERROR_KEY][INVOICE_ERROR_BASE_KEY][0] : '–' const subtotal = invoice[INVOICE_INNER_KEY][CONCEPT_KEY][0][INVOICE_TOTAL_KEY] / 100 const total = subtotal * 1.16 return ( {invoice[INVOICE_INNER_KEY][INVOICE_FOLIO_KEY]} {concept[CONCEPT_DESCRIPTION_KEY]} {invoice[RFC_KEY]} {concept[CONCEPT_PRODUCT_CODE_KEY]} {concept[CONCEPT_UNITY_CODE_KEY]} {concept[CONCEPT_QUANTITY_KEY]} {money(concept[CONCEPT_UNIT_PRICE_KEY] / 100)} {money(subtotal)} {money(total)} {errorMessage} ) } export const Sales = props => { let { invoices } = props let renderTable = null if (invoices.length > 0) { let renderInvoices = invoices.map((invoice, i) => renderInvoice(invoice, i)) renderTable = (
{renderInvoices}
Folio Descripción RFC emisor Código producto Código unitario Cantidad Precio Unitario Subtotal Total Validez Error
) } return renderTable } export default Sales
